title: Iranian Mossad agent recalls missile launcher mission
desc: The agent, known as "Arash," spoke to Channel 12's Uvda about the role he played as "Mossad's eyes" during an operation within Iran to destroy a ballistic missile launcher aimed towards Israel.

title: Lagos Couple Arrested for Staging Self-Kidnap for N10m
desc: A Lagos-based couple was arrested for faking their own abduction to extort N10m in ransom from family. Discover how they staged the self-kidnap.

title: California Jury Convicts Ex-Google Engineer of Stealing AI Secrets

title: AI-Supported Mammography Caught More Cancers During Screening
desc: Standard double reading did not perform as well as artificial intelligence for looking at catching cancer and reduced the rate of breast cancer diagnosis by 12%.
source: The American Journal of Managed Care® (AJMC®)
